text:
I need to hire a Frontend Dev or Web Designer to improve our Website made in HubSpot.
I would love some referrals that you trust.
Hey there <@URS3F45CM>  id suggest posting this in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs>. We have a lot of great folks in there that I'm sure would be happy to help

Sorry just saw you already did that :faceplam: . Anyhow good luck.

As a heads up, majority of the active folks on this slack are in the western hemisphere and so we probably have a lot of U.S. folks who may be slow to respond this week due to the U.S. Thanksgiving holiday.
Oh good to know! Thanks for the heads-up
